name: Tain't Rocket
description:
If God had intended for mankind to fly, he would have given us wings.
Instead, being of the stubborn kind, mankind invented rocket launchers.
At long last we joined our fellow feathered brethren in the skies, but going high soon wasn't enough...
We needed to go fast.

Features

  • High speed rocket jumping action!
  • Online leaderboards with replays!
  • 9 races with of varying difficulty levels, with a few tricky shortcuts!

Controls

The game uses the mouse and keyboard:

  • Mouse 1 click: shoot a rocket, hold longer for a faster projectile / straighter trajectory, can also be used to interact with UI elements (options / leaderboards)
  • Mouse move: look around
  • WASD: move around
  • Arrow keys: move around
  • Space bar: jump (hold for higher jump)

Third Party Credits

Music by 10270511 from Pixabay
BigRookGames - Stylized Rocket Launcher
Matthew Anett - Classic Footstep SFX
Lumino - Nature Sound FX
Kenney.nl - Fonts
Rocket launcher icons created by Freepik - Flaticon

The music is registered with ContentID, so careful if you upload footage to YouTube.
More details about how you can use it here.
